title: 'I'm now being hunted' - Wardley on becoming world champion
text: There's nothing bigger than what we're about to come into - McCullum. Video, 00:02:53There's nothing bigger than what we're about to come into - McCullum
summary: Fabio Wardley says he needs to "prove himself" to fans after the Briton became WBO champion following Oleksandr Usyk's decision to relinquish the title.
